|ThoughtDef.stages.1.description=It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
|ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-cn=似乎有什么东西在侵扰我的思想，一个声音，在我耳边，我只能听清几个字，这很讨厌。
|ThoughtDef.stages.1.description.zh-tw=一個久久不散的聲音在我腦子裡迴盪。我只能聽懂其中幾個詞，這聲音真讓人討厭。
|ThoughtDef.stages.1.baseMoodEffect=-7

|ThoughtDef.stages.2.label.zh-tw=干擾電波(中)
|ThoughtDef.stages.2.description=I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
|ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-cn=我感觉总是有看不见的人在跟我说话，声音一直在变但是内容不变，说我应该去伤害他人，让这声音停止吧！
|ThoughtDef.stages.2.description.zh-tw=我感覺有個看不見的東西在不停和我說話。說話的聲音會變但說的内容始终相同，慫恿我去殺掉别人，讓這聲音消失吧！
|ThoughtDef.stages.2.baseMoodEffect=-15
|ThoughtDef.stages.3=Exist
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.label=psychic drone (high)
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.label.zh-cn=心灵低语（高）
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.label.zh-tw=干擾電波(強)
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.description=The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-cn=说话的声音太响了，难以承受，精神也无法集中，我试图跟它说话，对着它吼叫，但是都毫无效果！
|ThoughtDef.stages.3.description.zh-tw=這聲音簡直響到到不能忍受，現在我集中精力都很困難。我發現我有時候甚至還會和這個聲音說話，甚至對它吼叫，但它就是不消失！

|ThoughtDef.stages.4.label.zh-tw=干擾電波(極端)
|ThoughtDef.stages.4.description=My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
|ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-cn=我的心脏在疯狂跳动，我浑身上下都是汗，我现在只想杀掉我周围的这些敌人，他们是我的噩梦……噩梦……噩梦……
|ThoughtDef.stages.4.description.zh-tw=我的心臟不停跳動而且我在不斷冒汗。我腦子裡唯一的事就是這些恐怖的敵人。它們簡直就是我的惡夢，我的惡夢，我的惡夢………………
